overview: As CCO of T3Media, Sal Siino oversees the company’s growing US sales operations, as well as its expanding roster of international sales offices. Sal brings more than 15 years of leadership experience to the position. Previously with Westwood One, he served as Executive Vice President of Sales, Marketing & Operations, where he oversaw more than $200 Million in annual revenues. Before joining Westwood One, he practiced law with Kelley, Drye & Warren in New York and worked as an investment banker in Merrill Lynch’s Mergers and Acquisitions group. Sal received his BA from Georgetown University, his J.D. from The George Washington University School of Law and his MBA from Harvard Business School.
